/usr/bin/cc   -rdynamic CMakeFiles/glfwinfo.dir/glfwinfo.c.o CMakeFiles/glfwinfo.dir/__/deps/getopt.c.o CMakeFiles/glfwinfo.dir/__/deps/glad_gl.c.o CMakeFiles/glfwinfo.dir/__/deps/glad_vulkan.c.o  -o glfwinfo  -Wl,-rpath,/media/WIN_PART/E_Drive/Repository/Github/OpenGLSeries/Libraries/GLFW/build/src ../src/libglfw.so.3.3 -lm
